item.title: Possible Infected Silver Birch Tree, 13th October
item.description:
The possible infected silver birch tree is in the street outside no.38 Clarence Square. There are some large honey-coloured fungal growths at the base of the tree. The tree itself looks quite stressed compared to other silver birch trees in the street after the dry summer.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Clarence Square, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked with leaves., 13th October
item.description:
Between 110 and 112 Cromwell Road. This is not a fault of Councilâ€¦ due to parking of Kholer Mira employees the Drain Cleaner is unable to reach the drains. Cones would be needed in advance!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 110, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
